dcterms:description: A dataset containing trajectories of granular flow generated from the Material Point Method (MPM) for training a graph neural network-based simulator.
dcterms:title: Granular Flow Trajectories

dcterms:creator: G. Lube
H. E. Huppert
R. S. J. Sparks
A. Freundt
dcterms:description: A dataset from experiments on the collapse of two-dimensional granular columns, used to evaluate the performance of the GNN-based simulator.
dcterms:title: Granular Column Collapse Experiment

dcterms:creator: K. Kumar
J. Vantassel
dcterms:description: A dataset containing simulations generated using the Graph Network Simulator, which is used for granular flow dynamics.
dcterms:title: Material Point Method (MPM) Simulations

dcterms:creator: K. Kumar
K. Soga
J.-Y. Delenne
F. Radjai
dcterms:description: A dataset containing simulations from both the Discrete Element Method (DEM) and the Material Point Method (MPM) to model transient dynamics of granular slopes.
dcterms:title: DEM and MPM Simulations

dcterms:creator: A. Sanchez-Gonzalez
J. Godwin
T. Pfaff
R. Ying
J. Leskovec
P. Battaglia
dcterms:description: A dataset that focuses on learning to simulate complex physics using graph networks, relevant for granular flow dynamics.
dcterms:title: Granular Flow Dynamics
